channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: #RahulGandhi Shows Off 'Jiu-Jitsu' Moves, Hints At 'Bharat D
item.description: #RahulGandhi Shows Off 'Jiu-Jitsu' Moves, Hints At 'Bharat Dojo Yatra' Congress MP writes "During the Bharat Jodo Nyay Yatra, as we journeyed across thousands of kilometers, we had a daily routine of practicing jiu-jitsu every evening at our campsite. What began as a simple way to stay fit quickly evolved into a community activity, bringing together fellow yatris and young martial arts students from the towns where we stayed. Our goal was to introduce these young minds to the beauty of the ‘Gentle Art’—a harmonious blend of meditation, jiu-jitsu, Aikido, and non-violent conflict resolution techniques. We aimed to instill in them the value of transforming violence into gentleness, giving them the tools to build a more compassionate and safer society. On this #NationalSportsDay, I want to share our experience with all of you, hoping to inspire some of you to take up the practice of the ‘Gentle Art’. P.S.: Bharat Dojo Yatra is coming soon" #BharatDojoYatra #Congress

item.title: The RG Kar Tapes on TIMES NOW: Here's what the victim's fami
item.description: The RG Kar Tapes on TIMES NOW: Here's what the victim's family was told- #Watch. 1st Call: Officials told the victim's father: 'Your daughter is not well; we're admitting her' 2nd Call: Officials told the victim's father: 'She may have committed suicide' #ShaktiFightback #KolkataHorror

item.title: Heroic rescue operations are being witnessed from Gujarat by
item.description: Heroic rescue operations are being witnessed from Gujarat by NDRF, SDRF, Indian Army and the Indian Coast Guards. Floods have battered the state and red alert has been issued in different districts. Shocking visuals have emerged from Gujarat and thousands of stranded people have been evacuated and sent to safer places. #IAF #GujaratFloods
